jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a skilled frontend developer to join our growing tech team. This role will be responsible for building responsive and engaging web applications.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in frontend development
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js
Experience with modern JavaScript frameworks and tools
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently
jobs.responsibilities: As a Frontend Developer, you will work closely with the UI/UX team to implement high-quality web interfaces and collaborate with backend developers to integrate APIs.
jobs.benefits: Health insurance, 401k match, remote work options, and paid time off.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Seeking an experienced backend developer to join our dynamic team. You will be building scalable backend services using modern technologies.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in backend development
Proficiency in Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
jobs.responsibilities: You will be responsible for designing and implementing robust APIs, optimizing database interactions, and ensuring system reliability and security.
jobs.benefits: Stock options, flexible working hours, and an annual learning stipend.

jobs.title: CHIEF TECHNOLOGY OFFICER
jobs.description: Seeking an experienced CTO to join our dynamic team. You will beleading the team of backend services using modern technologies.
requirements: 5+ years of experience as CTO
Proficiency in Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
PROBLEM SOLVING TECHNIQUE
Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
jobs.responsibilities: You will be responsible for leading and managing the designing and implementing team, optimizing database interactions, and ensuring system reliability and security.
jobs.benefits: health insurance, flexible working hours, children's education from the company and an annual bonus.
